title: Castalian spring
description: A spring in the ravine between the Phaedriades cliffs (on the lower southern slope of Mt. Parnassos) at Delphi.

properties.description: Location via Google Earth after descriptions in NPauly, Livius.org, Smith, as well as coordinates in Wikipedia and Panoramio photos surfaced via Google Earth.
properties.title: General area of the Castalian Spring at Delphi
